name: Time Thief (Delender1100)
description:
Time Thief is a Twin-Stick Shooter where you commit crimes such as Stealing Gold and breaking into ATMs while Pausing Time to dodge bullets and send more flying back. There are 5 levels to sneak around and seprate acts of vandalism and theft to commit. After you beat all 5 levels you can fight a final boss

           This game game was made for Mini Jam 60: Crime. This is my first game on Itch.io and is also my first Game Jam.  For the limitation I used Pausing Time as the Core Mechanic of the game. You can slow down time, fire a spread of 5 bullets in a split second and dashing around.
